Upgrade.Name: Heavy Laser Cannon
Upgrade.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all your Critical results to Hit results. Attack value: 4. Range: 23.

Upgrade.Name: Ion Cannon
Upgrade.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value: 3. Range: 13.

Upgrade.Name: Autoblaster
Upgrade.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Your ^HIT results cannot be cancelled by defense dice. The defender may cancel ^CRITICAL results before ^HIT results. Attack value: 3. Range 1.

Upgrade.Name: Flechette Cannon
Upgrade.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token. Then cancel all dice results. Range: 13. Attack value: 3.

Upgrade.Name: “Mangler” Cannon
Upgrade.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. When attacking, you may change 1 of your ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result. Range: 13. Attack value: 3.

Upgrade.Name: Tractor beam
Upgrade.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, the defender receives 1 tractor beam token. Then cancel all dice results. Range 13. Attack value: 3.

Upgrade.Name: Arc Caster
Upgrade.Description: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender to suffer 1 damage. Then flip this card. Attack value: 4. Range: 1.

Upgrade.Name: Proton Bomb
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 proton bomb token. The bomb detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When the bomb token detonates, deal 1 faceup damage card to each ship at Range 1 of this token. Then discard this token.

Upgrade.Name: Ion Bombs
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 ion bomb token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When thisbomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token receives 2 ion tokens. Then discard this token.

Upgrade.Name: Conner Net
Upgrade.Description: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 Conner net token. When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates. When this bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token suffers 1 damage, receives 2 ion tokens, and skips its "Perform Action" step. Then discard this token.

Upgrade.Name: Thermal Detonators
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal your manoeuvre dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 thermal detonator token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When this bomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token suffers 1 damage and receives 1 stress token. Then discard this token.

Upgrade.Name: Seismic Charges
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 seismic charge token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase. When the bomb detonates, each ship at range 1 of this token suffers 1 damage. Then discard this token.

Upgrade.Name: Cluster Mines
Upgrade.Description: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 cluster mine token set. When a ship's base or manoeuvre template overlaps a cluster mine token, that token detonates. When one of these bomb tokens detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped that token rolls 2 attack dice and suffers all damage (^HIT) rolled. Then discard that token.

Upgrade.Name: Proximity Mines
Upgrade.Description: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 proximity mine token. When a ship executes a maneuver, if its base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates. When the bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token rolls 3 attack dice and suffers all damage [^HIT] and critical damage [^CRITICAL] rolled. Then discard this token.

Upgrade.Name: Tactician
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Inspiring Recruit
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-2 removes a stress token, it may remove 1 additional stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Tail Gunner
Upgrade.Description: When attacking from your rear-facing auxiliary firing arc, reduce the defender's agility by 1 (to a minimum of 0). Limited.

Upgrade.Name: Bodhi Rook
Upgrade.Description: When you acquire a target lock, you can lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-3 of any friendly ship.

Upgrade.Name: Jyn Erso
Upgrade.Description: Action: Choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Assign 1 focus token to that ship for each enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3. You cannot assign more than 3 tokens this way.

Upgrade.Name: Baze Malbus
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack against a different ship. You cannot perform another attack this round.

Upgrade.Name: General Hux
Upgrade.Description: Action: Choose up to 3 friendly ships at Range 1-2. Assign 1 focus token to each of those ships and assign the "Fanatical Devotion" Condition card to 1 of them. Then receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Cassian Andor
Upgrade.Description: At the end of the Planning phase, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. Guess aloud that ship's bearing and speed, then look at its dial. If you are correct, you may rotate your dial to another manoeuvre.

Upgrade.Name: Bistan
Upgrade.Description: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result.

Upgrade.Name: Intelligence Agent
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 12. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver.

Upgrade.Name: Saboteur
Upgrade.Description: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.

Upgrade.Name: Recon Specialist
Upgrade.Description: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.

Upgrade.Name: Bombardier
Upgrade.Description: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [2] ^STRAIGHT template instead of the [1] ^STRAIGHT template.

Upgrade.Name: Nien Nunb
Upgrade.Description: You may treat all ^STRAIGHT maneuvers as green maneuvers.

Upgrade.Name: Weapons Engineer
Upgrade.Description: You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship). When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 enemy ships.

Upgrade.Name: Chewbacca
Upgrade.Description: When you are dealt a Damage card, you may immediately discard that card and recover 1 shield. Then, discard this Upgrade card.

Upgrade.Name: Luke Skywalker
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You may change 1 ^FOCUS result to a ^HIT result. You cannot perform another attack this round.

Upgrade.Name: "Chopper"
Upgrade.Description: You may perform actions while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 damage.

Upgrade.Name: Ezra Bridger
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, if you are stressed, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^CRITICAL result.

Upgrade.Name: Kanan Jarrus
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, after a friendly ship at Range 1-2 executes a white manoeuvre, you may remove 1 stress token from that ship.

Upgrade.Name: Sabine Wren
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^BOMB upgrade icon. Once per round, before a friendly bomb token is removed, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 of that token. That ship suffers 1 damage.

Upgrade.Name: Hera Syndulla
Upgrade.Description: You can reveal and execute red manoeuvres even while stressed.

Upgrade.Name: "Zeb" Orrelios
Upgrade.Description: Enemy ships inside your firing arc that you are touching are not considered to be touching you when either you or they activate during the Combat phase.

Upgrade.Name: "Leebo"
Upgrade.Description: Action: Perform a free boost action. Then receive 1 ion token.

Upgrade.Name: Dash Rendar
Upgrade.Description: You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle. Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

Upgrade.Name: Lando Calrissian
Upgrade.Description: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each ^FOCUS result, assign 1 focus token to your ship. For each ^EVADE result, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

Upgrade.Name: Gunner
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You cannot perform another attack this round.

Upgrade.Name: Jan Ors
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, when a friendly ship at range 13 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign an evade token instead.

Upgrade.Name: Kyle Katarn
Upgrade.Description: After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.

Upgrade.Name: WED15 Repair Droid
Upgrade.Description: Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.

Upgrade.Name: Carlist Rieekan
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to treat each friendly ship's pilot skill value as "12" until the end of the phase.

Upgrade.Name: Jan Dodonna
Upgrade.Description: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking, it may change 1 of its ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL.

Upgrade.Name: Toryn Farr
Upgrade.Description: Action: Spend any amount of energy to choose that many enemy ships at Range 12. Remove all focus, evade, and blue target lock tokens from those ships.

Upgrade.Name: Han Solo
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend that target lock to change all your ^FOCUS results to ^HIT results.

Upgrade.Name: C3-PO
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of ^EVADE results. If you roll that many ^EVADE results (before modifying the dice), add 1 ^EVADE result.

Upgrade.Name: Leia Organa
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red manoeuvre to treat that manoeuvre as a white manoeuvre until the end of the turn.

Upgrade.Name: R2-D2
Upgrade.Description: At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT result, randomly flip one of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.

Upgrade.Name: Targeting Coordinator
Upgrade.Description: Energy: You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range 12. Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.

Upgrade.Name: Raymus Antilles
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Activation Phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 13. You may look at that ship's chosen manoeuvre. If that manoeuvre is white, assign that ship 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Mercenary Copilot
Upgrade.Description: When attacking at Range 3, you may change one of your ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result.

Upgrade.Name: Darth Vader
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack against an enemy ship, you may suffer 2 damage to cause that ship to suffer 1 critical damage.

Upgrade.Name: Navigator
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing. You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens.

Upgrade.Name: Rebel Captive
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, the first ship that declares you as the target of an attack immediately receives 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Flight Instructor
Upgrade.Description: When defending, you may reroll one of your ^FOCUS results. If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.

Upgrade.Name: Moff Jerjerrod
Upgrade.Description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this upgrade card or another ^CREW upgrade card to flip that Damage card facedown (without resolving its effect).

Upgrade.Name: Fleet Officer
Upgrade.Description: Action: Choose up to 2 friendly ships at Range 12 and assign 1 focus token to each of those ships. Then receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Mara Jade
Upgrade.Description: At the end of the Combat phase, each enemy ship at Range 1 that does not have a stress token receives 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Ysanne Isard
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to your ship, you may perform a free evade action.

Upgrade.Name: Shield Technician
Upgrade.Description: When you preform a recover action, instead of spending all your energy, you can choose any amount of energy to spend.

Upgrade.Name: Shield Technician
Upgrade.Description: When you preform a recover action, instead of spending all your energy, you can choose any amount of energy to spend.

Upgrade.Name: Admiral Ozzel
Upgrade.Description: Energy: You may remove up to 3 shields from your ship. For each shield removed, gain 1 energy.

Upgrade.Name: Captain Needa
Upgrade.Description: If you overlap an obstacle during the Activation phase, do not suffer 1 faceup damage card. Instead, roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, suffer 1 damage.

Upgrade.Name: Grand Moff Tarkin
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose another ship at Range 14. Either remove 1 focus token from the chosen ship or assign 1 focus token to that ship.

Upgrade.Name: Emperor Palpatine
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, you may change a friendly ship's die result to any other die result. That die cannot be modified again.

Upgrade.Name: Agent Callus
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the first round, choose 1 enemy small or large ship. When attacking or defending agaist that ship, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^HIT or ^EVADE result.

Upgrade.Name: Greedo
Upgrade.Description: The first time you attack each round and the first time you defend each round, the first Damage card dealt is dealt faceup.

Upgrade.Name: Outlaw Tech
Upgrade.Description: After you execute a red manoeuvre, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship. Limited.

Upgrade.Name: K4 Security Droid
Upgrade.Description: After executing a green manoeuvre, you may acquire a target lock.

Upgrade.Name: Bossk
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, if you are not stressed, you must receive 1 stress token. Then assign 1 focus token to your ship and acquire a target lock on the defender.

Upgrade.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal a red maneuver, you may discard this card to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the Activation phase.

Upgrade.Name: Determination
Upgrade.Description: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Pilot trait, discard it immediately without resolving its effect.

Upgrade.Name: Marksmanship
Upgrade.Description: Action: When attacking this round, you may change one of your ^FOCUS results to a ^CRITICAL result and all your other ^FOCUS results to ^HIT results.

Upgrade.Name: Expert Handling
Upgrade.Description: Action: Perform a free barrel roll action. If you do not have the ^BARRELROLL action icon, receive 1 stress token. You may then remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

Upgrade.Name: Deadeye
Upgrade.Description: You may treat the "Attack [Target Lock]" header as "Attack [Focus]". When an attack instructs you to spend a target lock, you may spend a focus token instead.

Upgrade.Name: Push the Limit
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action shown in your action bar. Then receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Decoy
Upgrade.Description: At the start of Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 12. Exchange your pilot skill with that ship's pilot skill until the end of the phase.

Upgrade.Name: Wingman
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from another friendly ship at Range 1.

Upgrade.Name: Outmaneuver
Upgrade.Description: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, if you are not inside that ship's firing arc reduce its agility value by 1 (to a minumum of 0)

Upgrade.Name: Draw Their Fire
Upgrade.Description: When a friendly ship at range 1 is hit by an attack, you may suffer 1 of the uncancelled  results instead of the target ship.

Upgrade.Name: Veteran Instincts
Upgrade.Description: Increase your pilot skill value by 2.

Upgrade.Name: Elusiveness
Upgrade.Description: When defending, you may receive 1 stress token to choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die. If you have at least 1 stress token, you cannot use this ability.

Upgrade.Name: Lone Wolf
Upgrade.Description: When attacking or defending, if there are no friendly ships at Range 12, you may reroll one of your blank results.

Upgrade.Name: Stay on Target
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal a manoeuvre, you may rotate your dial to another manoeuvre with the same speed. Treat that manoeuvre as a red manoeuvre.

Upgrade.Name: Swarm Tactics
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the combat phase, choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1. Until the end of this phase, treat the chosen ship as if its pilot skill were equal to your pilot skill.

Upgrade.Name: Squad Leader
Upgrade.Description: Action: Choose one ship at range 12 that has a lower pilot skill. The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free action.

Upgrade.Name: Expose
Upgrade.Description: Action: Until the end of the round, increase your primary weapon value by 1 and decrease your agility value by 1.

Upgrade.Name: Predator
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die. If the defender's pilot skill is "2" or lower, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.

Upgrade.Name: Intimidation
Upgrade.Description: While you are touching an enemy ship, reduce that ship's agility value by 1.

Upgrade.Name: Ruthlessness
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack that hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender (other than yourself). That ship suffers 1 Damage.

Upgrade.Name: Opportunist
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, if the defender does not have any focus or evade tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die. You cannot use this ability if you have any stress tokens.

Upgrade.Name: Calculation
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^HIT result.

Upgrade.Name: Bodyguard
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend a focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1 with higher pilot skill than you. Increase its agility value by 1 until the end of the round.

Upgrade.Name: Crack Shot
Upgrade.Description: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, you may discard this card to cancel 1 of the defender's ^EVADE results.

Upgrade.Name: Lightning Reflexes
Upgrade.Description: After you execute a white maneouvre on your dial, you may discard this card to rotate your ship 180°. Then receive 1 stress token after the “Check Pilot Stress” step.

Upgrade.Name: Daredevil
Upgrade.Description: Action: Execute a white [ ^LEFTTURN 1] or [ ^RIGHTTURN 1] manouevre. Then, receive 1 stress token. Then, if you do not have the  action icon, roll 2 attack dice. Suffer any damage ^HIT or ^CRITICAL damage rolled.

Upgrade.Name: Ion Pulse Missile
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Discard this card to perform this attack. If the attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 2 ion tokens. Then cancel all dice results. Attack: 3. Range 23.

Upgrade.Name: Cluster Missiles
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your Target Lock and discard this card to perform this attack twice. Attack value: 3. Range: 12.

Upgrade.Name: Concussion Missiles
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your Target Lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change 1 of your blank results to a ^HIT result. Attack value: 4. Range: 23.

Upgrade.Name: Homing Missiles
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Discard this card to perform this attack. The defender cannot spend evade tokens during this attack. Attack: 4. Range 23.

Upgrade.Name: Assault Missiles
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, each other ship at range 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage. Attack: 4. Range 23.

Upgrade.Name: Advanced Homing Missiles
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target lock]: Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, deal 1 faceup Damage card to the defender. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value 4. Range 23.

Upgrade.Name: Proton Rockets
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Focus]: Discard this card to perform this attack. You may roll additional attack dice equal to your agility value, to a maximum of 3 additional dice. Attack value: 2. Range: 1.

Upgrade.Name: Chardaan Refit
Upgrade.Description: This card has a negative squad point cost.

Upgrade.Name: XX-23 S-thread Tracers
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Focus]: Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, each friendly ship at Range 12 of you may acquire a target lock on the defender. Then cancel all dice results. Attack value 3. Range 13.

Upgrade.Name: Hull Upgrade
Upgrade.Description: Increase your hull value by 1

Upgrade.Name: Munitions Failsafe
Upgrade.Description: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.

Upgrade.Name: Advanced SLAM
Upgrade.Description: After performing a ^SLAM action, if you did not overlap an obstacle or another ship, you may perform a free action.

Upgrade.Name: Engine Upgrade
Upgrade.Description: Your action bar gains the ^BOOST action icon.

Upgrade.Name: Shield Upgrade
Upgrade.Description: Increase your shield value by 1.

Upgrade.Name: Counter Measures
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 for the rest of the round. Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock token from your ship.

Upgrade.Name: Experimental Interface
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "Action:" header. Then receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: B-Wing/E2
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^CREW icon.

Upgrade.Name: Combat Retrofit
Upgrade.Description: Increase your hull value by 2 and your shield value by 1.

Upgrade.Name: Stygium Particle Accelerator
Upgrade.Description: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.

Upgrade.Name: Advanced Cloaking Device
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.

Upgrade.Name: Twin Ion Engine Mk. II
Upgrade.Description: You may treat all bank manoeuvres ( ^LEFTBANK or ^RIGHTBANK ) as green manoeuvres.

Upgrade.Name: Stealth Device
Upgrade.Description: Increase your agility value by 1. If you are hit by an attack, discard this card.

Upgrade.Name: Anti-Pursuit Lasers
Upgrade.Description: After an enemy ship performs a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, the enemy ship suffers 1 damage.

Upgrade.Name: Tactical Jammer
Upgrade.Description: Your ship can obstruct enemy attacks.

Upgrade.Name: Targeting Computer
Upgrade.Description: Your action bar gains the ^TARGETLOCK icon.

Upgrade.Name: Autothrusters
Upgrade.Description: When defending, if you are beyond Range 2 or outside the attacker's firing arc, you may change 1 of your blank results to a ^EVADE result. You can equip this card only if you have the ^BOOST icon.

Upgrade.Name: Maneuvering Fins
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal a turn maneuver (^LEFTTURN or ^RIGHTTURN), you may rotate your dial to the corresponding bank maneuver (^LEFTBANK or ^RIGHTBANK) of the same speed.

Upgrade.Name: Ion projector
Upgrade.Description: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, the enemy ship receives 1 ion token.

Upgrade.Name: Enhanced Scopes
Upgrade.Description: During the Activation phase, treat your pilot skill as "0".

Upgrade.Name: Fire-Control System
Upgrade.Description: After you perform an attack, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

Upgrade.Name: Advanced Sensors
Upgrade.Description: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform 1 free action. If you use this ability, skip your "Perform Action" step during this round.

Upgrade.Name: Sensor Jammer
Upgrade.Description: When defending, you may change 1 of the attacker's ^HIT results to a ^FOCUS result. The attacker cannot reroll the die with the changed result.

Upgrade.Name: Advanced Targeting Computer
Upgrade.Description: When attacking with your primary weapon, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may add 1 ^CRITICAL result to your roll. If you do, you cannot spend target locks during this attack.

Upgrade.Name: Accuracy Corrector
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, you may cancel all of your dice results. Then you may add 2 ^HIT results to your roll. Your dice cannot be modified again this attack.

Upgrade.Name: Moldy Crow
Upgrade.Description: During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

Upgrade.Name: Millennium Falcon
Upgrade.Description: Your action bar gains the ^EVADE action icon.

Upgrade.Name: Vectored Thrusters
Upgrade.Description: Your action bar gains the ^BARRELROLL icon.

Upgrade.Name: Outrider
Upgrade.Description: When you have a ^CANNON Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform Cannon secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

Upgrade.Name: A-Wing Test Pilot
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains 1 ^ELITEPILOTTALENT upgrade icon. You cannot equip 2 of the same ^ELITEPILOTTALENT upgrade cards. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "1" or lower.

Upgrade.Name: Dutyfree
Upgrade.Description: When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 1 (instead of at Range 2).

Upgrade.Name: Quantum Storm
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.

Upgrade.Name: Bright Hope
Upgrade.Description: A reinforce token assigned to your fore section adds 2 ^EVADE results (instead of 1).

Upgrade.Name: Jaina's Light
Upgrade.Description: When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.

Upgrade.Name: Dodonna's Pride
Upgrade.Description: When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1). Those ships may each perform 1 free action.

Upgrade.Name: Tantive IV
Upgrade.Description: Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional ^CREW and 1 additional ^TEAM upgrade icon.

Upgrade.Name: TIE/v1
Upgrade.Description: After you acquire a target lock, you may perform a free ^EVADE action.

Upgrade.Name: Slave-1
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^TROPEDO icon.

Upgrade.Name: ST-321
Upgrade.Description: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any target in the play area.

Upgrade.Name: Dauntless
Upgrade.Description: After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: Royal Guard TIE
Upgrade.Description: You may equip up to 2 different ^MODIFICAION upgrades (instead of 1). You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "4" or lower.

Upgrade.Name: TIE/x1
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^SYSTEMUPGRADE upgrade icon. If you equip a ^SYSTEMUPGRADE upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).

Upgrade.Name: TIE/Shuttle
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar loses all ^MISSILE , ^TORPEDO and ^BOMB upgrade icons and gains 2 ^CREW upgrade icons. You cannot equip an upgrade card that costs more than 4 squad points.

Upgrade.Name: Andrasta
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains two additional ^BOMB upgrade icons.

Upgrade.Name: BTLA4 Y-Wing
Upgrade.Description: You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a ^TURRET secondary weapon.

Upgrade.Name: Adaptive Ailerons
Upgrade.Description: Immediately before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white ( ^LEFTBANK 1), ( ^STRAIGHT 1), or ( ^RIGHTBANK 1) maneuver.

Upgrade.Name: “Heavy Scyk” Interceptor
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^CANNON, ^TORPEDO, or ^MISSILE upgrade icon.

Upgrade.Name: Virago
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^SYSTEMUPGRADE and ^ILLICIT upgrade icons. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "3" or lower.

Upgrade.Name: Mist Hunter
Upgrade.Description: Your action bar gains the ^BARRELROLL action icon. You must equip 1 "Tractor Beam" upgrade (paying the squad point cost as normal).

Upgrade.Name: IG2000
Upgrade.Description: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

Upgrade.Name: TIE/x7
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar loses the ^CANNON and ^MISSILE upgrade icons. After executing a 3, 4 or 5 speed maneuver, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

Upgrade.Name: TIE/D
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, after you perform an attack with a Cannon secondary weapon that costs 3 or fewer squad points, you may perform a primary weapon attack.

Upgrade.Name: Ion Torpedoes
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If the attack hits, the defender and each ship at Range 1 of it receives 1 ion token. Attack value: 4. Range: 23.

Upgrade.Name: Proton Torpedoes
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change one of your ^FOCUS results to a ^CRITICAL result. Attack value: 4. Range: 23.

Upgrade.Name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to attack. You may change up to 3 of your blank results to ^FOCUS results. Attack value: 5. Range: 1.

Upgrade.Name: Flechette Torpedoes
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend you target lock an discard this card to perform this attack. After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or less. Attack value: 3. Range: 23.

Upgrade.Name: Extra Munitions
Upgrade.Description: When you equip this card, place 1 ordnance token on each equipped ^TORPEDO, ^MISSILE, and ^BOMB Upgrade card. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 ordnance token on that card instead. Limited.

Upgrade.Name: Plasma Torpedoes
Upgrade.Description: Attack [Target Lock]: Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, after dealing damage, remove 1 shield token from the defender.

Upgrade.Name: Bomb Loadout
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the ^BOMB icon. Limited.

Upgrade.Name: A Score To Settle
Upgrade.Description: During setup, before the "Place Forces" step, select 1 enemy ship and assign the "A Debt ToPay" Condition card to it. When attacking a ship that has the "A Debt To Pay" Condition card, you may change 1 undefined result to a undefined result.

Upgrade.Name: Wired
Upgrade.Description: When attacking or defending, if you are stressed, you may reroll 1 or more of your ^FOCUS results.

Upgrade.Name: Cool Hand
Upgrade.Description: When you receive a stress token, you may discard this card to assign 1 ^FOCUS or ^EVADE token to your ship.

Upgrade.Name: Expertise
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may change all of your ^FOCUS results to ^HIT results.

Upgrade.Name: Trick Shot
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, if the attack is obstructed, you may roll 1 additional attack dice.

Upgrade.Name: Snap Shot
Upgrade.Description: After an enemy ship executes a manoeuvre, you may perform this attack against that ship. Attack: Attack 1 ship. You cannot modify your attack dice and cannot attack again this phase. Attack value: 2. Range: 1.

Upgrade.Name: Juke
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, if you have an evade token, you may change 1 of the defender's ^EVADE results into a ^FOCUS result.

Upgrade.Name: Adaptability (Increase)
Upgrade.Description: Dual Card. Either: Increase your pilot skill value by 1; or: Decrease your pilot skill value by 1.

Upgrade.Name: Adaptability (Decrease)
Upgrade.Description: Dual Card. Either: Increase your pilot skill value by 1; or: Decrease your pilot skill value by 1.

Upgrade.Name: Attanni Mindlink
Upgrade.Description: Each time you are assigned a focus or stress token, each other friendly ship with Attanni Mindlink must also be assigned the same type of token if it does not already have one.

Upgrade.Name: Rage
Upgrade.Description: Action: Assign 1 focus token to your ship and receive 2 stress tokens. Until the end of round, when attacking, you may reroll up to 3 dice.

Upgrade.Name: Fearlessness
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, if you are inside the defender's firing arc at Range 1 and the defender is inside your firing arc, you may add 1 ^HIT result to your roll.

Upgrade.Name: Hyperwave Comm Scanner
Upgrade.Description: At the start of the "Place Forces" step, you may choose to treat your pilot skill value as "0", "6" or "12", until the end of the step. During setup, after another friendly ship is placed at Range 1-2, you may assign 1 focus or evade token to it.

Upgrade.Name: Primed Thrusters
Upgrade.Description: Stress tokens do not prevent you from performing boost or barrel roll actions unless you have 3 or more stress tokens.

Upgrade.Name: Pattern Analyzer
Upgrade.Description: When executing a manoeuvre, you may resolve the "Check Pilot Stress" step after the "Perform Action" step (instead of before that step).

Upgrade.Name: Sensor Cluster
Upgrade.Description: When defending, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your blank results to an ^EVADE result.

Upgrade.Name: Weapons Guidance
Upgrade.Description: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a ^HIT result.

Upgrade.Name: Comm Relay
Upgrade.Description: You cannot have more that 1 evade token. During the End phase, do not remove an unused evade token from your ship.

Upgrade.Name: Targeting Synchronizer
Upgrade.Description: When a friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking a ship you have locked, the friendly ship treats the "Attack [targetlock]" :header as "Attack:" If a game effect instructs that ship to spend a target lock, it may spend your target lock instead.

Upgrade.Name: Guidance Chips
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, when attacking with a ^TORPEDO or ^MISSILE secondary weapon, you may change 1 die result to a ^HIT result (or a ^CRITICAL result if your primary weapon value is "3" or higher).

Upgrade.Name: R2-D2
Upgrade.Description: After executing a green maneuver, you may recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

Upgrade.Name: R2-F2
Upgrade.Description: ACTION: Increase your agility value by 1 until the end of this game round.

Upgrade.Name: R5-K6
Upgrade.Description: After spending your target lock, roll 1 defense die. On an ^EVADE result, immediately acquire a target lock on that same ship. You cannot spend this target lock during this attack.

Upgrade.Name: R5 Astromech
Upgrade.Description: During the End phase, you may choose 1 of your faceup Damage cards with the Ship trait and flip it facedown.

Upgrade.Name: R2 Astromech
Upgrade.Description: You may treat all 1- and 2-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

Upgrade.Name: R5-D8
Upgrade.Description: Action:  Roll 1 defense die. On an ^EVADE or ^FOCUS result, discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards.

Upgrade.Name: R2-D6
Upgrade.Description: Your upgrade bar gains the elite upgrade icon. You cannot equip this upgrade if you already have an elite upgrade icon or if your pilot skill value is "2" or lower.

Upgrade.Name: R3-A2
Upgrade.Description: When you declare the target of your attack, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may receive 1 stress token to cause the defender to receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: R4-D6
Upgrade.Description: When you are hit by an attack and there are at least 3 uncancelled ^HIT results, you may choose and cancel those results until there are 2 remaining. For each result cancelled in this way, receive 1 stress token.

Upgrade.Name: R5-P9
Upgrade.Description: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 of your focus tokens to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

Upgrade.Name: R7-T1
Upgrade.Description: ACTION: Choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. If you are inside that ship's firing arc, you may acquire a target lock on that ship. Then, you may perform a free ^BOOST action.

Upgrade.Name: R7 Astromech
Upgrade.Description: Once per round when defending, if you have a target lock on the attacker, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all attack dice. The attacker must reroll the chosen dice.

Upgrade.Name: BB-8
Upgrade.Description: When you reveal a green maneuver, you may perform a free ^BARRELROLL action.

Upgrade.Name: R5-X3
Upgrade.Description: Before you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to ignore obstacles until the end of the round.

Upgrade.Name: Targeting Astromech
Upgrade.Description: After you execute a red maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.

Upgrade.Name: R3 Astromech
Upgrade.Description: Once per round, when attacking with a primary weapon, you may cancel 1 of your ^FOCUS results during the "Modify Attack Dice" step to assign 1 ^EVADE token to your ship.

Upgrade.Name: M9-G8
Upgrade.Description: When a ship you have locked is attacking, you may choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die. You can acquire target locks on other friendly ships.
